alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Elliott; Floyd; Johnson; Lee; Magoffin; Martin; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 10:25PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong gusty showers will impact portions of Owsley, southeastern Jackson, Knott, Floyd, eastern Menifee, Lee, southeastern Rowan, Wolfe, southeastern Powell, Martin, Morgan, Johnson, northwestern Leslie, Perry, Breathitt, Magoffin, northern Clay and Elliott Counties through 1115 PM EST... At 1023 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong gusty showers along a line extending from near Olive Hill to Zekes Point. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusty showers will be near...Ricetown, Oneida, Bruin, Cowcreek, Eversole and Chestnut Gap around 1035 PM EST. Valjean, Lucky Fork, Mistletoe, Morris Fork, Whoopflarea, Arnett, Brutus and Houston around 1040 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these showers include Buckhorn, Dalesburg, Buckhorn Lake S.P., Beech, Crockettsville, Saul, Shoal, Talbert, Sebastian`s Branch, Canoe, Chavies, Krypton, Barwick, Lamont, Bush Branch, Altro, Mosley Bend, Wolf Coal, Confluence, Hazard, Dice, Ned, Bulan, Ary, Cordia, Rowdy, Diablock, Vicco, Emmalena, Carrie, Ritchie, Fisty, Bearville, Tina, Talcum, Elic, Anco, Hindman, Leburn, Brinkley, Ivis, Garner, Mallie, Amburgey, Soft Shell, Spider and Vest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Elliott; Floyd; Johnson; Lee; Magoffin; Martin; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe
